metadata.feature_description: Analytics dashboard for blog content including post views, comments, and engagement

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel should open with module tabs including Blogs
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel fails to load - content area is blank/empty
TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025)

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics panel from loading: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempted to access Blogs tab in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Blogs tab should display blog post statistics
steps.actual: Cannot access Blogs tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel JavaScript initialization failure

steps.action: Attempted to access Blogs tab to view comment engagement metrics
steps.expected: Blogs tab should display comment engagement data
steps.actual: Cannot access Blogs tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel JavaScript initialization failure

steps.action: Attempted to access Blogs tab to view author activity metrics
steps.expected: Blogs tab should display blog author activity data
steps.actual: Cannot access Blogs tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel JavaScript initialization failure

steps.action: Attempted to access Blogs tab to view popular blog posts
steps.expected: Blogs tab should display popular blog posts list
steps.actual: Cannot access Blogs tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel JavaScript initialization failure

steps.action: Attempted to access Blogs tab to verify blog-specific metrics
steps.expected: Blogs tab should display blog-specific metrics (views, comments, engagement)
steps.actual: Cannot access Blogs tab - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel JavaScript initialization failure

observations: The Community Analytics menu item exists under Dashboard in PersonaBar and is accessible
The Blogs tab extension is properly registered in the module manifest (Evoq.PersonaBar.CommunityAnalytics.dnn) with identifier 'Evoq.CommunityAnalytics_Blogs'
The backend API endpoints exist in Services/CommunityAnalyticsController.cs including GetModuleDashboardInfo, GetModuleTagStats, and GetModulePopularContent which should support Blogs analytics

A critical JavaScript error prevents the entire Community Analytics panel from loading: 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025
This appears to be a missing dependency or compatibility issue where the 'utility' module does not have the 'serializeCustomDate' function that the dashboard initialization code expects
All Blogs Module Analytics test scenarios failed because the parent Community Analytics panel cannot be accessed
